metadata.title: CVE-2024-42267 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:riscv/mm: Add handling for VM_FAULT_SIGSEGV in mm_fault_error()Handle VM_FAULT_SIGSEGV in the page fault path so that we correctlykill the process and we don't BUG() the kernel.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
